content.detailedDescription:
Began by seeing bright star like glowing object moving across the sky, coming from a northern direction heading south across the sky in mosman sydney.
as a keen aviation and plane enthusiast it displayed no characteristics like a plane and moved with small erratic movements, with a fuzzy halo like glow around it.
the object veered off to a western direction towards north sydney.
content.summary: Golden like star, almost like star from sky moving in unconventional style.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo scanning power pole in our neighborhood.
content.summary: See video

content.detailedDescription: On the night of the 27th my friend and i observed multiple ufos flying all over the livermore valley. there were several that had no lights but you could see their outline. they flew over my friends head while i was in the house. she felt they were dive bombing over her. the next day we were outside having coffee when i looked up and saw in very low clouds above us four panels in each panel was a figure two human,one looking like chewbaca from star wars and the last looked like a plasma entity floating. i told my friend and she looked up and saw the same thing i did. it was totally something that we've never seen in our lives.
content.summary: On two consecutive dayd we watched ufos flying all over.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading up the hill on carroll ln, about to turn right onto kiping pl when i saw a circular object stationary in the sky. in about 5 seconds of looking at this object i voluntarily blinked to refresh my eyes because i was stunned at what i was seeing. upon opening my eyes, the object was gone. it was not very far from me for i could make out that the top was smooth looking and the bottom was smaller with darker features. it was also in a clear patch of blue sky. for it to disappear within less than a second of my blinking eyes was surreal. no tech that has been released to the public could have moved as fast as that thing must have or cloaked. i'm curious if anyone else saw this object?
content.summary: Saw circular object for about 5 seconds then blinked and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Getting gas at the bp gas station on the corner of loomis rd and layton ave, when spotted the first few orbs coming up from south-south west in no flight pattern appeared moving slowly towards the northwest about 5 were seen at the time before they disappeared. then the next set of orbs were seen this time there were 5 or 6 that followed the first round of lights no sound was heard from them as they went northwest and just disappeared like the first set of orbs. all very bright orange slowly pulsating approaching and leaving with no sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Multiple bright pulsating orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping on the couch in the living room. it was 3:00 am. i woke up to see an alien standing in the living room by the french doors. it was looking toward the room my daughter was sleeping in. i rose slowly as to approach the being hoping to get a better look. i was about three feet away when it turned to look at me. it then beamed through the doors in a bright flash and disappeared. it stood about three feet tall had large eyes slits for a nose and mouth and no visible ears. it was muddy grey in color with shiny smooth skin when i saw its profile about half way down the back of its head it had a large bulge which blended down to its neck. the only light that was on was a night light in the kitchen so i could not see the rest of its body.






















.




.
content.summary: I wad awakened at 3:00 am by a being standing by the french doors.

content.detailedDescription: Went out for a cig and looked up to the south see a rather large glowing circle with a ring around it and then more light around it, it was inside the clouds and glowed enough to omit light it moved west then up at 30 or 45 degree angle,i thought maybe flood light but it never changed size as a circlar light would and it was inside the clouds not a reflection.I live close to wpab and have seen a lot of crafts but never anything like this.
content.summary: Went out saw a large round object glowing just inside clouds with a dark ring go from stopped to move west and then up

content.detailedDescription:
Drivning north on wilimington pike in kettering,ohio in front of meijers shoping center.  i observed 2 objects  stationary and  was cirular with orange and red lights,i heard no noise present. i pulled into a filling station at east stroop and wiliming pike to watch the objects.After a couple minutes both ojects disappeared.The sky was overcaste,arouund 9pm.There was no air traffic other than these 2 objects.I surprised to 

see the objects.
content.summary: Stationartyshoping center over meijer shoping centers on fterwilimington rd in kettering,ohio

content.detailedDescription:
On the 5th of july 2014 i had dinner on my back patio on westlake.  after dinner my son and his girl friend wend down to our electric boat on the lake to talk and i went to take the dishes inside.  when i came out i went down to my boat where my son and his girlfriend were sitting.  he immediately said dad we called for you we saw a ufo moving around overhead from the north to the south and it was blinking on and off.  i am a private pilot and a retired electronic engineer and we see aircraft flying from san francisco to lax continually in the evening coming from the north and moving to the se so i said it must have been a plane.  they said no it was a ufo.   i sat down and we started to talk. about 5 minutes later i saw a flash in the  sky which was due west of us about 10-20 miles which would put it over oxnard or perhaps over the pacific ocean.  the flash lasted 1-2 seconds it was bigger and about 10 times brighter than a strobe on a commercial airliner and 10 times brighter than a plane with their landing lights on.  the size of the flash was about the size of my thumb nail. i yelled out i just saw a flash.  about 5 seconds later it flashed again and my sons girl friend saw it and said that's what we saw.  then about 5 seconds later it flashed again and all three of us saw it.  we watched intensely to see if it was going to flash again. it flashed a 3 and 4 time moving a few inches in the sky between each flash. it was about 20-30 degrees off the horizon. i estimate the object to be between 3,000- 5,000 feet above the ground.

on the 4 the flash, within a few milliseconds from the start of the flash a meteor streaked from orbit straight down towards the flashing object. the meteor had a trail of sparks and it intersected with the path of the strobe  light.  they both went out at the exact time they intersected.    i immediately thought something was shooting at the object from space.  it looked like at the time they intersected that they hit but there was no  explosion or flash, they both just went out as it looked like they hit. because there was no explosion i am not sure they actually hit.  we watched the sky for another 30 minutes but never saw either of the objects again.

what is the chance of seeing a meteor at the same time as the ufo and what are the chances of them intersecting in the sky at the same time?

so i am not sure if this was a alien space craft or a missile test.  the object was near pt. magoo navel base but i believe it was north of that base which is about 20 miles from here.  

i would appreciate if you have any similar sightings to let me know.
content.summary: shooting star or missle shoots at a ufo from space

content.detailedDescription:
Pink craft opened into a wormhole like opening by use of plasma ray 

multiple times a regular traffic pattern there on

film. last observed one month ago.
content.summary: Pink craft opened into a wormhole like opening by use of plasma ray

content.detailedDescription: I was at the  great highway near ocean beach in san francisco with my girlfriend and noticed something an object of glowing lights north west of ocean beach and started moving awkwardly i thought... i notice the object was headed headed in our direction so i took two pictures and made a 35 second video......  something i never seen before in my life and it scares me, it looked iike was controlled military? or some type of intelligence....I took 2 pictures in october i just noticed it last night ,and took a look at them... the pics blew my mind and video... i showed the pictures and video to family members last night and they were absolutely sure that is something of a ufo technology-based something and they said i should call you guys. please call me contact me my phone number is [phone number redacted/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: I was near the great highway in san francisco near ocean beach spotted there's very bright star light light moving very awkward like i thought north west hovering over land mass near abeach i took pictures and made video

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside for a smoke with my uncle as i do every night at that time. looked up(as i always do) and 3 objects came from the north to the south about at 2 second intervals right over our heads.
they appeared to be rocket-looking by the flame-like light coming out the back of them. there were misty clouds they were traveling through(in and out) and i could get a clear look at their shape which was solid and missile-like(no wings). i live near 3 major airports so i see jets all the time, at night there is a constant display of about 4-8 at any given time, these were silent and lower then the other jets in the area.
several months ago i posted a thread on ats about this, again it was at 10:pm sharp every night for about a week straight then it stopped. that was several months ago my user name on ats is antebellum.
these were lower then those and for the first time their shapes were visible. i would like to know what they were. they looked like shooting stars but were traveling at conventional speed as compared to other jets flying overhead at other times. my uncle witnessed them also but his vision is not that great but he did see the yellow flame-like light coming out the back of these 3 objects. will go out again tonight at 10:pm to try and get some photos.
content.summary: 3 backlit missile-like objects went over my house last night

content.detailedDescription: I have reported this before and do not see my sighting posted. i am reposting this report again. this was the most incredible thing i ever saw in my life. there is to much to say to be able to post here in a few brief statements. every time i would go to the plaza in hamburg i would always sense something in the sky... like there was something in the sky for second and would be gone. it would be above the buildings along the plaza where we would go shopping. one day we went to eat at applebee's, and i decided to play a trick without anyone looking. my family went around a corner on the way to enter the building, and i jumped back out for a second and waved into the direction i thought i seen something, then went back around the corner. as i walked inside the building to get my seat, i was shocked by electric from head to toe. it almost felt like i stepped on a power cord. i went and sat in my seat next to the window overlooking the parking lot where i waved when i was outside. then i seen a 100 foot long perfect disc come down out of the sky graceful. it was silver looking on top like reflecting the sky. i just stared at it not really thinking about what i was really looking at. it hovered then landed in the parking lot. a white beam cascaded down from the bottom. then i started to see other vehicles come out of no where that all had different shapes, colors, and sizes flying in all different directions all at very fast speeds. i herd no sounds. it dawned on me that this was weird and what was i looking at? i thought in a second of disbelief turning my head to look if this was a reflection on the window from a tv or something. there was no tv and i snapped my head back to look again to figure out what i was seeing. then once i was going to stand up, to take a closer look, the disc took off above the ground where it landed into a hover position. then it darted off into the sky about a 100 feet up. the disc now had some dimension to it with little port lights all around the edges and spun in a counter clockwise motion. the faster the disc traveled the faster it spun. it travels at a super sonic speed in a shuffle like motion... staggered but fast. it traveled another 100 feet across the sky then stopped again... and then came back down to hover above the ground again. then it changed shape with some kind of protrusion coming out from underneath it. it was all black looking like the sharp rigged edges over lapping itself. there were little port lights between each edge. the bottom part of the object looked like it had markings and designs with a silver looking horn shape on each end. it swopped up somehow to the window, at least some portion of this thing. for a few second, there was a round port light pressed up on the window. i stair at it trying to see what was in the white crystal looking light at least 5 feet across in front of me. it was like looking into a window that was lighted up on the inside but you could not see anything. it then suddenly flew straight up and was gone. nothing more was in the parking lot in sight. this was the main disc i was watching, i felt there was more going on in the parking lot, but i did not want to take my eyes off the larger disc because i was afraid it would be gone. somehow i felt more was going on that i could not see. these were space craft, not ufo's from what i seen. it draws me to a lot of questions and thoughts. what is going on and what the hell was that? my reaction after that was, did i really see what i think i saw... seemed impossible if not out of this world. my daughter sitting next to me that never said a word picked up her soup bowel and flipped it upside down in the air... she was 12 years old... i said, "what did you see" she said in a very friendly voice that they were the people from space. it only verified what i seen and i did not say a word up until then. it made me feel what i seen was real and what could it have been? i did see two people walking around outside the building looking in at us after this event. i debated to go outside and look around but decided to just stay where i was for then. just one note; there are telephone lines over that parking lot that it came down between and landed. i made note of that while watching this event. a few months later the telephone poles were cut and caused a black out in hamburg, new york. they said they found the man that cut them down but he stated that he never cut them down. i think that there is a lot more to the story... the wind blew them down but they were all partially cut utility pole in orchard park new york jan 24 2012. it is strange to think that maybe this had something to do with the ufo/ objects i seen in the same place?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Metalic dome disc 100 feet across landed close with in 20 feet of me in parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: This sighting took place in late august 2004 just after 6:00am. i always rode my mountain bike to for exercise, that day was no different, about 30 seconds after turning onto the last section of residential street of my route "someone" ran into the street about 25-30 feet in front of me, the entity was in a full sprint as if it's life depended on it, like something was chasing it, it came from the yard on the east side of the street, crossed the street in full sprint and entered the yard on the west side, the sighting lasted about 5 seconds, this entity was bi-pedal and about 1-1.5 feet tall wearing an earthy greenish brown hooded cloak, the only features visible were the ankle and feet, both clad in the same greenish brown color, once it entered the grass it visibly disappeared as if the cloak color shifted to match the grass, my first thought was "gnome"!?!, rational thinking told me gnomes don't exist, i was confused, but never told anyone of the sighting, cause i would just face harassment or ridicule, to this day i've never told anyone about it. i didn't report it sooner cause i only found out about mufon three months ago, from time to time i would have flashbacks about the sighting, but for the most part i forgot about it, then last week on youtube there was video in my "what to watch" list titled alien races: a-z, so i watched it, then the second part listed a race named "lang", it pictured two point eared human like entities, instantly i had a flashback of the encounter and said out loud "that's it! that's what i saw!", so i looked around the internet for "alien race lang" and apparently lang are source of elven folklore, said to be about 70 centimeters tall (about 2 feet).
content.summary: Not a ufo, but an et sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I had a motion camera set up deep in the woods on my grandfather land to see if i could catch some photos of some deer. i left the camera in the woods for a week. i took my memory card out the camera and it stayed in my truck for a few days before i got around to look at what it captured on my laptop. the first few pictures was nothing i guess the wind blew something in the view. the next three pictures was of a raccoon. the next picture was taken the next night on the 26th. the whole picture was white light i thought it was just a messed up photo until the next few frames got a little darker each time. now on the 9th and 10th picture i can make out the woods with a white glow coming from the left side with a small grayish being around 3 1/2 feet tall quickly flashes across the picture. the reason i say quickly is because the three pictures that it was captured in was within 6 seconds and the width would have to be around 15 feet. i don't know if there may have been others but my camera only caught the one shape. 
i have only showed the photos to one friend.
content.summary: A motion camera in woods caught photo of bright light then some frames later a small being

content.detailedDescription: We were rock climbing on fake rocks and when i was looking around i saw it i stared for a very long time. it was just hovering. i was always lover of ufos even having a t-shirt. i was not startled but, happy and excited to see one. i ran to tell ----- and by the time i came back it was gone.----- told me that other people said that other people saw it. ----- told me that it was also most likely some stars. then i got a vision (well all i remember during that part)of it going over a baseball field. as we went to the next part of our journey i saw 6 more small things i believe they were airplanes or planes though, i saw them fly north. they were small with green lights in a triangle and with a red dot in the middle. i was very surprised with this event because i was not expecting it.
content.summary: Large triangle lights with 6 other small ones

content.detailedDescription:
This is crazy but ....I was watch a movie (jaws) the first one. an hour or so into the movie where they are chasing the shark around in the boat (orca). the exact place this ufo shows up is in the scene is when roy scheider goes up on the bow of the boat while its underway chasing the shark. this ufo comes streaking across the horizon (behind him) @ about 10,000 feet . whats bizarre is that it goes across the screen from right to left. then within 20 seconds it comes by again except its going across the screen from left to right. clear too and glowing heavily with what looks like a pulse type of propulsion with wild red trail being generated at he same time. it is hauling ass. also it is not doctored up or been altered. they have had to see this. i have seen this movie a million times and never saw it. i did a frame by frame and it etc and it was incredible. one big burst goes off wich most of it id blocked by roy sheider's head. let me know what you think. 

i keep watching it ................
content.summary: Saw it in a hollywood movie as they were filming it, very clear

content.detailedDescription: Outside having a cigarette, looking at the stars,it streaked across the sky with incredible speed, i was shocked, this is the second sighting i have had in the same place outside my yard,, it disappeared into the distance very quickly.
content.summary: Flew over the house with incredible speed white with red streak behind

content.detailedDescription: I was camped out in my back yard. i heard a loud roar and looked to the sky and seen 3 balls of lights, they hovered and then started to seem like to start playing with each other. they pulsed on and off some. they was seen for about 1 minute and then shot out of sight at crazy speed 1 by1. unreal.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Loud roar . 3 circle balls of light hovering for 30 sec then up down left right swirling around for 30 sec or more. then dashes off at a crazy speed and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Go to 1-14th daily staff journals  1969    jan14, 17,19 and so on  use  a downloader like chrome to see declassified pages  these where observed on a fire base out in the middle of nowhere 35 miles sw of pleiku. the radar was a mortar radar used to detect enemy rouds  on lz oasis 15 miles ne  i never had a pc until late.     the pages are official us army declassified   material of the 4th infantry div rvn 1969 and are made public
content.summary: Various lts and brightness going diff directions also caused electr interfence

content.detailedDescription: I get home at 11;14 pm at october the 17 2014 and i sow my cameras monitors on so i was ready to turn it off before this happens i sow this light moving at the back of my truck and then i wake my wife and we start looking at it at i get kind of afraid i start thinking bad things as you see on tv i keep looking until the sphere goes away at the next morning i start checking the dvr and i discover that the sphere it record for about one hour and a half i send some of the video and you are welcome to ask me any question or analyze it you got all my information you can contact me at any time
content.summary: Sphere

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on hwy 270 between hwy 40 & ladue rd. crazy electrical storm some small clouds moderate too heavy lighting. on phone w/friend looking @ lighting storm off too nw off too my left slighty but through front car window. lightning struck bright then dark, next flash same exact spot object spotted w/3 lights appearing too be on bottom orion belt configuration 
red, orange, blue, green sky went dark again.. next large lighting flash illuminated large bright rectangular shaped object @ which point object w/3 lights flew into bright rectangular object too it's right my left was obsorbed as in vanished followed by large rectangular object 
shooting in a straight line across the sky too it's left my right @ a very un normally high rate of speed across the sky & vanished into thin air..
just like that !!! upon reaching my subdivision/street @ the end of culdesac & exiting my car standing in the driveway windy for about 5 sec then complete stillness @ which time i heard a very low deep in tone horn that sounded off about 7 or 8 seconds then more quite about 7/8 seconds followed by 4 very distinct thuds like a base drum with sounds of trees breaking coming closer too me & about 5 too 7 second delay in between each thud. 
this is what i believe too be the 4th encounter i've experienced in so much as 19 years.
last 3 within past 3 years. i felt a bit frightened bewildered & confused by all of them.
3 of them in missouri 1 in california. i knew instantly all 4 times that it was nothing that could be explained away.. by anything other then what they were each time!!!!
other then the feelings i've explained my immediate reaction was too tell someone what i had witnessed & heard..
the most recent sighting i've explained on sept 1st was caught on a sky cam from the top of a local news stations building which i was later privy too after explaining too a friend what i had seen as he was kind enough too forward too me the footage from their website weeks later something triggered me too look up that night on news webpage again & miraculously that portion of the footage no longer is on their page
however others had too have seen it also as i found a mere but unmistakable scrap of that same image on another site. this prompted me too inquire about a locally held mufon mtg
which i attended for the first time last night & since have decided too speak with others & probably become a member of this organization.
thank you for hearing me that is all for now.
ps as far as how many witnesses it was on a local news broadcast as well so i don't know i'm guessing 1000's ? but since i'm required too give a head count of witnesses too this event & was alone when i seen this personally .. going too have too say 1?
content.summary: 2 seperate objects 1st one 3 lights on bottom of craft like orion's  belt, 2nd one large rectangular bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out onto my porch at appoximately 10:30 pm to look at the night sky, facing cerro gordo hill, when i saw a very bright white light, appearing to be round, descend at about a 45 degree angle from roughly north to north east.

the object behaved in what i call a "wobbly" manner as it descended. it slowly descended in a sort of up and down, undulating motion, and not in a straight, precision line. i watched it for a few seconds until the light abruptly (instantly) went out or disappeared.

my first thought was ufo! just prior to the sightingi had a very intense personal expierence. i did not feel any fear or anxiety, in fact i felt peaceful and lucky to have had the very brief experience. i spent ten years watching the skies in northern new mexico, star gazing, looking at planets and constellations and falling stars but this felt different, almost exhilerating.
content.summary: Saw very bright white light sphere/ord descending

content.detailedDescription:
I was out front of my house with a friend smoking a cigarette and watching the evening arrivals to sky harbor. i first spotted the light at about 30 degrees above the horizon. it stuck out because of it's apparent speed and lack of visible nav lights. as a pilot and lifelong aviation enthusiast i'm pretty familiar with how things should look in the sky and something about the size, speed, color just didn't seem right.

several ideas passed through my head: lantern, balloon with lights, aircraft with lights off. just as quickly as i could think of explanations i would rule them out. 

as we continued watching it the light passed almost directly over our heads and continued to the west where it either passed into a cloud bank or faded out about 45 degrees above the horizon. also it was totally silent. we could hear plenty of planes that evening but nothing from that object.
content.summary: Orange orb travelling east to west directly overhead no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I take photos for tahoe action photography at alpine meadows ski resort next to tahoe city in the lake tahoe area.

it was 12:30pm, as i was waiting for my next group of skiers a male skier who had just come off the ski lift started walking towards me but was looking up in the sky.  i didn't think much of it.  he asked me if my camera had a good lens.  i was slightly puzzled but replied and said the lens is good but i can't zoom that far out, it only goes up to 55.  i asked why, he said there was a guy on his chair lift earlier who said he saw 3 unexplainable objects in the sky.  you could tell it was windy higher up because the clouds were going by at about 15-20mph.  i looked up, didn't see anything and the guy i was talking to went on skiing but kept looking up as he went. 


i kept looking up but didn't see anything for about 5 min until there was a break in the clouds and that's when i witnessed the first one.  basically it looked like a white orb.  if you really starred at it, it looked almost rectangular but that could of been just from looking at it too long?  i moved over a few feet and waited a little longer for a bigger break in the clouds.  after about 10 or 15 min there was a much clearer sky and you could easily see 3 objects that were all hovering perfectly still within the atmosphere between 15,000 and 20,000 feet i'd say just like the skier has said.  i pointed it out to almost everyone within earshot distance to me.  everyone tripped out with wonder, excitement and a little uneasiness all at the same time.    


it was definitely not something you see everyday in the sky and everyone knew it.   by the time i left my station on the mountain it was 3:30-3:45pm and i saw that the middle object had move further south.


by process of  elimination balloons were out because the wind was clearly blowing fast so balloons would have moved all over the place if they were tethered down.  aircraft, like helicopters were out because you would of been able to hear 1 let alone 3 if they were hovering, these weren't making any sound.  even small drones were out because they eventually have to refuel.  if it was military why would they remain stationary in an area that could be hit by passing aircraft?  


i witnessed the same thing about a year ago above the city of reno.  very similar thing, it was pretty high up, looked like an orb of some sort, remained stationary for a while then slowly moved in one direction alone a straight path till i lost sight of it.
content.summary: 3 objects within our atmosphere arpox 20,000 feet up, illuminated or reflected sun light, as they hovered still for hours.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed and got up. i went to the window of my bedroom and when i turned around, a figure was standing in my doorway.  the door was closed and i couldn't make out much other than the outline of a humanoid figure.  the head was pointed and overall appeared was silky smooth grey with some lighted areas.  second encounter was up close and figure had yellowish eyes, very traumatic experience.  don't remember much more than that.

my first encounter seeing it in the doorway ended without any other memory of what happened next.  i just woke up the next morning.  over the years i have suppresed the memory because only now i am remembering it again.
content.summary: Entity had a pointed head and appeared grey in color 4 feet in height

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking my dog i noticed a helicopter fly over my head, in the highest point of my neighborhood. i could hear it through my headphones and got a great view of it. an hour later around 11 p.M i was smoking a cigarette, in the same spot i watched a meteor shower from a few days ago. almost in the same direction i saw another shooting star, before i could think anything it shoots down incredibility low and fast. the plump behind it becomes very elongated and glows bright blue. it lowers to what i would guess as about a mile up and stops! i get a clear 3 second glance as it rotates from south to west. the actual object may have been round and cylindrical, but i know the engine shot a bright green light, it looked like a rectangular jet. on what i'm guessing is the cabin i saw 2 lights, green and red. which made me think it could have been military. but the speed, then hovering, then the direction change, and the meteorite like plumb made it impossible! the cabin looked almost like glass, like see through or maybe metal that had a slight glow. as i sew the cabin turn toward the west, i see the green jets brighten but the object just disappeared. no plumb following it, no sound, it just vanishes. it was to quick for me to say if the lights on the cabin were blinking or not, and the body of the object was very hard to make out. i have no doubt what i saw was real, and crazy advanced. i'm attaching a crude hand drawn picture, the body may not be correct. but i know the rear of the object was definitely rectangular.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A blue shooting star like plumb encased the object. it stopped dramatically,changed direction, i saw green thrusters and it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the side of the road in my car eating a sandwich facing west, on east side of county line road and a mile north of the erie airfield, i saw a metallic object floating up towards a low ceiling of cumulous clouds, it was moving as a leaf would fall only inverse, going up. i at first thought it was a bird, but immediately noted it's apparent size and metallic appearance, i estimate it to have been the size of a cessna, possibly a little smaller. it soared as a hawk would and traversed the sky going north, then went straight up, making sudden changes in vector that a conventional plane or even helicopter could not, i then imagined a "drone"? especially after it whirled around revealing a front "grill" with three white lights, i also noted the sun occasionally peeking through the cloud cover would reflect off the object. it then took off on a northwest heading towards boulder airport, "zig-zagging", flying as a bird would....
this sighting is one of many i have witnessed while living in colorado, the largest objects witnessed by me, were huge fireballs traveling parallel to the ground, those sightings were a few years apart, both at 3am or there abouts, and one was heading towards the mountains, while the other heading away...
during my time here i have also spotted and identified the stealth fighters and bombers making runs at norad, obviously doing detection maneuvers.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: What first looked like a

content.detailedDescription: I've noticed object several times before flying overhead it appeared to land one time but i couldn't find it. this time while walking down 36th and chestnut st in philly a cop car pulled over to the curb outside a hotel. then i heard a voice call my name. as i turned around i noticed a star across the street and a voice sounding like it was coming from a bull horn warning me i better not move. this was in broad daylight with plenty of people on the street including a cop. i ignored the warning and proceeded to continue walking. at that moment it was about 1.00 pm. as i took a few steps suddenly i was about 10 miles from where i was and night had fallen. confused i looked up and saw a blue starship slowly passing overhead. it appeard to be flying rather low not making a sound. it's appearance was similar to the fantastic 4 space ship if you will but larger. i lost lots of time and later had visions of the occupants of the ship examining me and running test on me. the same entities i had numerous dreams about and had conversations with- the ancient egyptian gods one who identified himself as amen ra
content.summary: Walking then abducted, loss of time taken aboard ship examined

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and his brother, witness (b) were at a secluded deer hunting blind which was a 2 hour hike in 10 inches of snow from their vehicle.  the location was on top of a prominent hill with a broad view of the valley below.  after getting setup, still prior to sunrise, they noticed about a half dozen flashes of light, it was snowing moderately, when all of a sudden at close range, a stationary ball of white light appeared just above the tree tops nearby, the trees were about 30 feet high and the distance away was less than a 100 feet.  the object appeared to be about the size of a small car, appeared to be a glowing blue/white ball of light with no edges and no attached object.  after a few seconds of being stationary the object proceeded to flow down the valley, parallel to the ground and disappeared, total sighting duration of about 30 seconds.  the winds observed were from the north, the object departed to the east.  no tracks, imprints or changes to the nearby snow cover.
content.summary: Eight foot diameter, glowing blue/white ball of light with no edges and no attached object, less than 100 feet away, stationary then a path parallel to the ground, duration 30 seconds.
